content:
littered napkin leads to attempted kidnapping by Clemson employee

Clemson students hold Take Back Pride march after tampons removed from mens bathrooms

Possible Delta8 overdose at Lightsey Bridge

Clemson recorded no hits against Duke in the ACC Championship semifinals on May   PERIOD

Clemson failed to record a single hit against Duke on Friday as the Tigers fell to the Blue Devils  in the semifinals of the ACC Championship in South Bend Indiana PERIOD

All in all the Tigers had  atbats only two of which resulted in a batter getting on base PERIOD Shortstop Alia Logoleo and third baseman Reedy Davenport both got on base on hitbypitches PERIOD

Duke pitcher Cassidy Curd gave Clemson fits all day pitching the nohitter and recording eight strikeouts in . innings pitched PERIOD

Meanwhile Mille Thompson got the start for Clemson before Brooke McCubbin took over in the third inning PERIOD McCubbin gave up one hit and one run and recorded three strikeouts in . innings pitched PERIOD Thompson received the loss in the circle allowing four hits and one run in . innings pitched PERIOD

With the semifinals defeat Clemson failed to make the ACC Championship finals after reaching it the last two seasons PERIOD

The Tigers will know their postseason fate on Sunday when the NCAA Tournament seedings and matchups are revealed PERIOD

Your donation will support the student journalists of Clemson University  PERIOD Your contribution will allow us to purchase equipment and cover our annual website hosting costs PERIOD
